title: Notes on a Conditional Form
label: Dirty Hit
description: The latest album continuing the band's exploration of introspective themes with a focus on personal growth and artistic experimentation.

title: III
label: Dualtone Music Group
description: A concept album exploring the complexities of family dynamics and addiction.

title: Cleopatra
label: Dualtone Music Group
description: An album inspired by travels and experiences, weaving tales of love and adventure.

title: OK Computer
label: Parlophone
description: A landmark album known for its complex soundscapes and commentary on technology and society.

title: The 1975
label: Dirty Hit
description: The debut studio album by English rock band The 1975. It blends indie rock with electronic elements, featuring introspective lyrics and atmospheric production.

title: Nevermind
label: Sound City
description: In a stroke, Nevermind legitimised college rock, aestheticised it and tossed off choruses that can make anyone feel included.

title: I Like It When You Sleep, for You Are So Beautiful yet So Unaware of It
label: Dirty Hit
description: Perhaps their greatest tribute is that the 1975, despite being in their mid-twenties and on their second album, are just like them: messy, earnest, vulnerable, unedited, gaudy.

title: Being Funny in a Foreign Language
label: Dirty Hit
description: Achingly raw, brutally honest, and (above all) hopeful, ‘Being Funny in a Foreign Language’ is a softly stunning masterpiece: The 1975’s fifth studio album is their most realized, heartfelt, and loving work to date.

title: The Dark Side of the Moon
label: Capitol Records
trackListing: The Great Gig in the Sky
description: A sonic masterpiece, that uncomplicatedly blends haunting lyrics and innovative soundscapes, Pink Floyd's The Dark Side of the Moon is a timeless, genre-defining experience.

title: Origins
label: Interscope Records
description: Origins is an eclectic mix of powerful anthems and introspective tracks, showcasing Imagine Dragons' versatility and emotional depth in a compelling package.

title: The Lumineers
label: Dualtone
description: The Lumineers' self-titled debut album is a heartfelt journey through folk-inspired melodies and evocative lyrics, delivering raw emotion and timeless storytelling.

title: Hybrid Theory
label: Warner Bros.
description: Hybrid Theory is the debut studio album by American rock band Linkin Park, released on October 24, 2000, by Warner Bros. Records. The album was a commercial success, having been certified Diamond for sales of over 10 million copies in the United States alone.
